WORKS like a charm. Just tried it got to the first chekpoint quited to desktop, launched the game again and continued from where i last were, so the savegame works, graphics direcx 9 tested works and directx10and11 are doing also great, OS:windows 7 x64, playing it now



If anyone got probs with the install, here is step by step how i did it:

1. Unrar Red Faction Armageddon STEAMCRACKED-P2P.rar

2. Go to folder Red Faction Armageddon STEAMCRACKED-P2P

3. Unrar Red.Faction.Armageddon.Crack.Patch.By.Ali213.rar

4. Run patch Red.Faction.Armageddon.Crack.Patch.By.Ali213.exe

5. Follow screens

6. Run rf4_launcher.exe play any DX u wish

Crashes as soon as you launch, both in dx11 and dx9.

Works perfectly on Windows 7 64Bit.
Extract , run the crack .exe, but you don't use the new launchers, just use the "rf4_launcher" and you will have the option to choose DX11 etc.
Pretty good game so far. Not free roam like the last one, but still lots of destruction!

The clone dvd image worked for me perfectly... Mount image on virtual clone drive and use phoenix1.4 beta to install the game. Then apply the crack patch by ali about 9.5 MB and click on rf4launcher to play the game. However the game did not work on Windows Vista. It worked on Windows XP with the latest version of Direct X. Phoenix will automatically install the other apps required. When extracting using phoenix, set the destination to any drive other than the C drive which is the OS drive. Good luck...

I am unable to post the link here you can google and download the clone DVD image.


INSTALL Phoenix 1.4 Beta . 

SELECT INSTRUMENTS->UPDATE CONTENT DESCRIPTION RECORD and select INTERNET. ALLOW IT TO UPDATE . .SELECT INSTRUMENTS->SID UNPACKER and browse for a SIM file in the extracted Red faction Directory. . Allow it to Extract !
